javax.constraints
Interface Var

All Superinterfaces:
ConstrainedVariable
All Known Subinterfaces:
VarBool
public interface Var
extends ConstrainedVariable

This interface represents constrained integer variables, the most frequently used type of constrained objects.

Method Summary

          Adds and returns a new Var that is constrained to be the absolute value of this variable.
